original: Theravāda Vinayapiṭaka
analyzed: thera vāda vinaya piṭaka

analyzed: mahāvagga

analyzed: mahākhandhaka

original: 1. Bodhikathā
analyzed: bodhi kathā

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā uruvelāyaṁ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā uruvelāyam viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhi rukkha mūle paṭhama abhisambuddhaḥ

original: Atha kho bhagavā bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṁvedī.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā bodhi rukkha mūle sattāham eka pallaṅkena nisīdi vimutti sukha paṭisavedī

original: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ anulomapaṭilomaṁ manasākāsi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamam yāmam paṭiccasamuppādam anuloma paṭilomam manasā akāsi

original: “Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ, nāmarūpapaccayā
analyzed: avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇa viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpa nāma rūpa paccayā

analyzed: nisīdi vimutti sukha paṭisavedī

analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ huhuṅka jātikaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—

original: “kittāvatā nu kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo hoti, katame ca pana brāhmaṇakaraṇā dhammā”ti?
analyzed: kittāvatā nu kho bho gotama brāhmaṇaḥ hoti katame ca pana brāhmaṇa karaṇāḥ dhammā ti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi—

original: Nihuṁhuṅko nikkasāvo yatatto;

original: Vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo,
analyzed: vedantagū

original: Dhammena so brahmavādaṁ vadeyya;

analyzed: na atthi kuhiñci loke ti

analyzed: ajapāla kathā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā ajapāla nigrodha mūlā

analyzed: yena mucalindaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mucalinda mūle eka pallaṅkena

original: nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṁvedī.
analyzed: nisīdi vimutti sukha paṭisavedī

original: Tena kho pana samayena mahā akālamegho udapādi, sattāhavaddalikā sītavātaduddinī.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena mahā akāla meghaḥ udapādi satta aha vaddalikā sīta vāta duddinī

original: Atha kho mucalindo nāgarājā sakabhavanā nikkhamitvā bhagavato kāyaṁ sattakkhattuṁ bhogehi parikkhipitvā uparimuddhani mahantaṁ phaṇaṁ karitvā aṭṭhāsi—
analyzed: atha kho mucalindaḥ nāga rājā saka bhavanā nikkhamitvā bhagavato kāyam satta kkhattum bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari muddhani mahantam phaṇam karitvā aṭṭhāsi

original: “mā bhagavantaṁ sītaṁ, mā bhagavantaṁ uṇhaṁ, mā bhagavantaṁ ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphasso”ti.
analyzed: mā bhagavantam sīta mā bhagavantam uṇha mā bhagavantam ḍasama kasa vāta ātapa sarīsapa samphassa uti

original: Atha kho mucalindo nāgarājā sattāhassa accayena viddhaṁ vigatavalāhakaṁ devaṁ viditvā
analyzed: atha kho mucalindaḥ nāga rājā satta ahassa accayena viddham vigata valāhakam devam viditvā

original: bhagavato kāyā bhoge viniveṭhetvā sakavaṇṇaṁ paṭisaṁharitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṁ abhinimminitvā
analyzed: bhagavato kāyāḥ bhoge viniveṭhetvā sa ka vaṇṇam paṭisaharitvā māṇavaka vaṇṇam abhinimminitvā

analyzed: bhagavato puratas aṭṭhāsi pañjalikaḥ bhagavantam namassamānaḥ

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi—

original: “Sukho viveko tuṭṭhassa,
analyzed: sukhaḥ vivekaḥ tuṭṭhassa

original: sutadhammassa passato;
analyzed: suta dhammassa passataḥ

original: pāṇabhūtesu saṁyamo.

analyzed: sukhā virāga tā loke

analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā mucalinda mūlā yena

analyzed: rājāyatanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā rājāyatana mūle sattāham eka pallaṅkena nisīdi

original: vimuttisukhapaṭisaṁvedī.
analyzed: vimutti sukha paṭisavedī

original: Tena kho pana samayena tapussa bhallikā vāṇijā ukkalā taṁ desaṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena tapussa bhallikāḥ vāṇijāḥ ukkalāḥ tam desam addhāna magga ppaṭipannāḥ honti

original: Atha kho tapussabhallikānaṁ vāṇijānaṁ ñātisālohitā devatā tapussabhallike vāṇije etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho tapussabhallikānam vāṇijānam ñātisālohitā devatā tapussabhallike vāṇije etat avoca

original: “ayaṁ, mārisā, bhagavā rājāyatanamūle viharati paṭhamābhisambuddho;
analyzed: mārisā bhagavā rājāyatana mūle viharati paṭhama abhisambuddhaḥ

original: gacchatha taṁ bhagavantaṁ manthena ca madhupiṇḍikāya ca patimānetha;
analyzed: gacchatha tam bhagavantam manthena ca madhupiṇḍikāya ca patim ānetha

original: taṁ vo bhavissati dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
analyzed: tat vaḥ bhavissati dīgharattam hitāya sukhāya ati

original: Atha kho tapussabhallikā vāṇijā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhaṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho tapussa bhallikāḥ vāṇijāḥ manthañca madhu piṇḍikañca ādāya yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhasu

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho tapussabhallikā vāṇijā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: ekamantam ṭhitā kho tapussabhallikāḥ vāṇijāḥ bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “paṭiggaṇhātu no, bhante, bhagavā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca, yaṁ amhākaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
analyzed: paṭiggaṇhātu naḥ bhante bhagavā manthañca madhu piṇḍikañca yam amhākam assa dīgharattam hitāya sukhāya ati

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ

original: “na kho tathāgatā hatthesu paṭiggaṇhanti.
analyzed: na kho tathāgatāḥ hatthesu paṭiggaṇhanti

original: Kimhi nu kho ahaṁ paṭiggaṇheyyaṁ manthañca madhupiṇḍikañcā”ti?
analyzed: kimhi nu kho aham paṭiggaṇheyyam mantham ca madhu piṇḍikañca ati

original: Atha kho cattāro mahārājāno bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya catuddisā cattāro selamaye patte bhagavato upanāmesuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho cattāraḥ mahā rājānaḥ bhagavato cetasā cetaḥ upari vitakka maññāya catuddisā cattāraḥ sela maye patte bhagavataḥ upanāmesu

original: “idha, bhante, bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu manthañca madhupiṇḍikañcā”ti.
analyzed: idha bhante bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu manthañca madhu piṇḍikañca ati

original: Paṭiggahesi bhagavā paccagghe selamaye patte manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca, paṭiggahetvā paribhuñji.
analyzed: paṭiggahesi bhagavā paccagghe sela maye patte manthañca madhu piṇḍikañca paṭiggahetvā paribhuñji

original: Atha kho tapussabhallikā vāṇijā bhagavantaṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ viditvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho tapussabhallikāḥ vāṇijāḥ bhagavantam onīta patta pāṇim viditvā bhagavataḥ pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “ete mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāma dhammañca, upāsake no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṁ gate”ti.
analyzed: ete bhante bhagavantam saraṇam gacchāma dhammañca upāsake naḥ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇam gatā iti

original: Te ca loke paṭhamaṁ upāsakā ahesuṁ dvevācikā.
analyzed: te ca loke paṭhamam upāsakāḥ ahesum

original: Rājāyatanakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: rāja āyatana kathā niṭṭhitā

original: 5. Brahmayācanakathā
analyzed: brahma yācana kathā

original: Atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā rājāyatanamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā rāja āyatana mūlā yena ajapāla nigrodho tena upasaṅkami

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā ajapālanigrodhamūle viharati.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavān ajapāla nigrodha mūle viharati

original: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavataḥ rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: “adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
analyzed: adhigataḥ kho myā ayam dhammaḥ gambhīraḥ duddasaḥ duranubodhaḥ santaḥ paṇītaḥ a takka avacaraḥ nipuṇaḥ paṇḍita vedanīyo

original: Ālayarāmā kho panāyaṁ pajā ālayaratā ālayasammuditā.
analyzed: ālaya rāmā khalu pana ayam pajā ālaya ratā ālaya sammuditā

original: Ālayarāmāya kho pana pajāya ālayaratāya ālayasammuditāya duddasaṁ idaṁ ṭhānaṁ yadidaṁ idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo;
analyzed: ālaya rāmāya kho pana pajāya ālaya ratāya ālaya sammuditāya duddasam idam ṭhānam yat idam idappaccaya tā paṭiccasamuppādaḥ

original: idampi kho ṭhānaṁ sududdasaṁ yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: idam api kho ṭhānam su duddasam yat idam sabba saṅkhāra samatho sabba upadhi paṭinissaggo taṇhā kkhayaḥ virāgaḥ nirodhaḥ nibbāna

original: Ahañceva kho pana dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ, pare ca me na ājāneyyuṁ, so mamassa kilamatho, sā mamassa vihesā”ti.
analyzed: aham ca iva kho pana dhammam deseyya pare ca me naḥ ājāneyyu saḥ mamassa kilamatho sā mamassa vihesā ati

original: Apissu bhagavantaṁ imā anacchariyā gāthāyo paṭibhaṁsu pubbe assutapubbā—
analyzed: bhagavantam imāḥ anacchariyāḥ gāthāyaḥ pubbe a ssuta pubbā

original: Atha kho brahmuno sahampatissa bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya etadahosi—

original: “nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko, yatra hi nāma tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ namati, no dhammadesanāyā”ti.
analyzed: nassati vata bho lokaḥ vinassati vata bho lokaḥ yatra hi nāma tathāgatassa arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa appa ussukka tāya cittam namati no dhamma desanāya ati

original: Atha kho brahmā sahampati—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya; evameva—brahmaloke antarahito bhagavato purato pāturahosi.
analyzed: atha khalu brahmā sahampati seyyathā api nāma balavā purisaḥ samiñjitam vā bāham pasāreyya pasāritam vā bāham samiñjeyya evam eva brahma loke antarahitaḥ bhagavataḥ puratas pātuḥ ahosi

original: Atha kho brahmā sahampati ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ pathaviyaṁ nihantvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha khalu brahmā sahampati ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā dakkhiṇa jāṇu maṇḍalam pathaviyam nihantvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “desetu, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṁ, desetu sugato dhammaṁ.

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi—

original: “kassa nu kho ahaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ?
analyzed: kassa nu kho aham paṭhamam dhammam deseyya

original: Ko imaṁ dhammaṁ khippameva ājānissatī”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ imam dhammam khippam eva ājānissati iti

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ

original: “ayaṁ kho udako rāmaputto paṇḍito byatto medhāvī dīgharattaṁ apparajakkhajātiko;
analyzed: ayam kho udakaḥ rāmaputto paṇḍitaḥ byattaḥ medhāvī dīgharattam appara jakkha jātikaḥ

original: yannūnāhaṁ udakassa rāmaputtassa paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ, so imaṁ dhammaṁ khippameva ājānissatī”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham udakassa rāmaputtassa paṭhamam dhammam deseyya saḥ imam dhammam khippam eva ājānissati iti

original: Atha kho antarahitā devatā bhagavato ārocesi—“abhidosakālaṅkato, bhante, udako rāmaputto”ti.
analyzed: atha kho antarahitā devatā bhagavataḥ ārocesi abhidosaka alaṅkataḥ bhante udakaḥ rāmaputto ti

original: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṁ udapādi—“abhidosakālaṅkato udako rāmaputto”ti.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ api kho ñāṇam udapādi abhidosaka alaṅkataḥ udakaḥ rāmaputto ti

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ

original: “mahājāniyo kho udako rāmaputto;
analyzed: mahājāniyaḥ kho udakaḥ rāmaputto

original: sace hi so imaṁ dhammaṁ suṇeyya, khippameva ājāneyyā”ti.
analyzed: sace hi saḥ imam dhammam suṇeyya khippam eva ājāneyya ati

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ

original: “kassa nu kho ahaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ?
analyzed: kassa nu kho aham paṭhamam dhammam deseyya

original: Ko imaṁ dhammaṁ khippameva ājānissatī”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ imam dhammam khippam eva ājānissati iti

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ

original: “bahukārā kho me pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū, ye maṁ padhānapahitattaṁ upaṭṭhahiṁsu;
analyzed: bahu kārāḥ kho me pañcavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū ye mama padhāna pahita ttam upaṭṭhahisu

original: yannūnāhaṁ pañcavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham pañcavaggiyānam bhikkhūnam paṭhamam dhammam deseyyanti

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ

original: “kahaṁ nu kho etarahi pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū viharantī”ti?
analyzed: kaham nu kho etarahi pañcavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū viharanti iti

original: Addasā kho bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena pañcavaggiye bhikkhū bārāṇasiyaṁ viharante isipatane migadāye.
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena pañcavaggiye bhikkhū bārāṇasiyam viharante isipatane migadāye

original: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelāyaṁ yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena bārāṇasī tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān uruvelāyam yathābhirantam viharitvā yena bārāṇasī tena cārikam pakkāmi

original: Addasā kho upako ājīvako bhagavantaṁ antarā ca gayaṁ antarā ca bodhiṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannaṁ, disvāna bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: addasā kho upakaḥ ājīvakaḥ bhagavantam antarā ca gayam antarā ca bodhim addhāna magga ppaṭipanna disvāna bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso, indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
analyzed: vippasannāni kho te āvuso indriyāni parisuddhaḥ chavi vaṇṇaḥ pariyodāto

original: Kaṁsi tvaṁ, āvuso, uddissa pabbajito?
analyzed: kasi tvaṃ āvuso uddissa pabbajitaḥ

original: Ko vā te satthā?
analyzed: kaḥ vā te satthā

original: Kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesī”ti?
analyzed: kassa vā tvam dhammam rocesi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā upakaṁ ājīvakaṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi—

original: “Sabbābhibhū sabbavidūhamasmi,

original: Sabbañjaho taṇhākkhaye vimutto,
analyzed: sabbañjaho taṇhā khaye vimutto

analyzed: sayam abhiññāya kam uddiseyya

analyzed: na me ācariyaḥ atthi

original: sadiso me na vijjati;

original: Sadevakasmiṁ lokasmiṁ,
analyzed: sa devakasmin

original: natthi me paṭipuggalo.
analyzed: natthi me paṭipuggalaḥ

original: Ahañhi arahā loke,
analyzed: ahañhi arahā loke

original: ahaṁ satthā anuttaro;

original: Ekomhi sammāsambuddho,

original: sītibhūtosmi nibbuto.

original: Dhammacakkaṁ pavattetuṁ,

original: Gacchāmi kāsinaṁ puraṁ;
analyzed: gacchāmi kāsinam pura

original: Andhībhūtasmiṁ lokasmiṁ,

original: Āhañchaṁ amatadundubhin”ti.
analyzed: āhan śam amatadundubhinti

original: “Yathā kho tvaṁ, āvuso, paṭijānāsi, arahasi anantajino”ti.

original: “Mādisā ve jinā honti,
analyzed: mādisā ve jināḥ honti

original: ye pattā āsavakkhayaṁ;
analyzed: ye pattāḥ āsava kkhaya

original: Jitā me pāpakā dhammā,
analyzed: jitāḥ me pāpakāḥ dhammā

original: tasmāhamupaka jino”ti.
analyzed: tasmāt aham upaka jinoti

original: Evaṁ vutte, upako ājīvako hupeyyapāvusoti vatvā sīsaṁ okampetvā ummaggaṁ gahetvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: evam vutte upakaḥ ājīvakaḥ hupeyya pāvuso ti vatvā sīsam okampetvā ummaggam gahetvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena bārāṇasī isipatanaṁ migadāyo, yena pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena bārāṇasī isipatanam migadāyaḥ yena pañcavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasaṁsu kho pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ;
analyzed: addasasu kho pañcavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhagavantam dūratas vas āgacchanta

original: disvāna aññamaññaṁ katikaṁ saṇṭhapesuṁ—
analyzed: disvāna aññam aññam katikam saṇṭhapesu

original: “ayaṁ, āvuso, samaṇo gotamo āgacchati, bāhulliko padhānavibbhanto āvatto bāhullāya.

original: So neva abhivādetabbo, na paccuṭṭhātabbo, nāssa pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahetabbaṁ;
analyzed: saḥ na iva abhivādetabbaḥ na paccuṭṭhātabbaḥ na assa patta cīvaram

analyzed: api ca kho āsanam sace saḥ ākaṅkhissati nisīdissati iti

original: Yathā yathā kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū upasaṅkamati tathā tathā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū nāsakkhiṁsu sakāya katikāya saṇṭhātuṁ.
analyzed: yathā yathā kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū upasaṅkamati tathā tathā pañcavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū na asakkhisu sakāya katikāya saṇṭhātu

original: Asaṇṭhahantā bhagavantaṁ paccuggantvā eko bhagavato pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahesi, eko āsanaṁ paññapesi, eko pādodakaṁ, eko pādapīṭhaṁ, eko pādakaṭhalikaṁ upanikkhipi.
analyzed: a saṇṭhahantā bhagavantam paccuggantvā ekaḥ bhagavataḥ patta cīvaram paṭiggahesi ekaḥ āsanam paññapesi ekaḥ pāda udake ekaḥ pāda pīṭhe ekaḥ pāda kaṭhalikam upanikkhipi

original: Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane;
analyzed: nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane

analyzed: nisajja kho bhagavā pāde pakkhālesi

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū etadavoca—

original: Arahaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgato sammāsambuddho, odahatha, bhikkhave, sotaṁ, amatamadhigataṁ, ahamanusāsāmi, ahaṁ dhammaṁ desemi.

analyzed: tāya api kho tvam āvuso gotamaḥ iriyāya tāya paṭipadāya tāya dukkara kārikāya

analyzed: uttari manussa dhammāḥ alam ariya ñāṇa dassana visesa kim pana tvam etarahi bāhullikaḥ

original: Atha kho pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ sussūsiṁsu, sotaṁ odahiṁsu, aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho pañcavaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhagavantam sussūsisu sotam odahisu aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi—

original: “Dveme, bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā.
analyzed: dve me bhikkhave antāḥ pabbajitena na sevitabbā

original: Katame dve?
analyzed: katame dve

original: Yo cāyaṁ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito, yo cāyaṁ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṁhito.
analyzed: yaḥ ca ayam kāmesu kāma sukhallika anuyogaḥ hīnaḥ gammaḥ pothujjanikaḥ anariyaḥ anattha sahitaḥ yaḥ ca ayam atta kilamatha anuyogaḥ dukkhaḥ anariyaḥ anattha sahitaḥ

original: Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ete kho bhikkhave ubho ante an upagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhu karaṇī ñāṇa karaṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati?
analyzed: katamā ca sā bhikkhave majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhu karaṇī ñāṇa karaṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: ayam eva ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
analyzed: sammā diṭṭhi sammā saṅkappo sammā vācā sammā kammanto sammā ājīvaḥ sammā vāyāmaḥ sammā sati sammā samādhi

original: Ayaṁ kho sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ayam kho sā bhikkhave majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhu karaṇī ñāṇa karaṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya savattati

original: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ.
analyzed: idam kho pana bhikkhave dukkham ariya sacca

original: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṁ, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: jāti pi dukkhā jarā api dukkhā byādhi pi dukkhaḥ maraṇam pi dukkha appiyehi sampayogaḥ dukkhaḥ piyehi vippayogaḥ dukkhaḥ yam piccham na labhati tam pi dukkha

original: Saṅkhittena, pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā.
analyzed: saṅkhittena pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ dukkhā

original: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccaṁ—
analyzed: idam kho pana bhikkhave dukkha samudayam ariya sat ca

original: yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yā ayam taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandī rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī

original: kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā.
analyzed: kāma taṇhā bhava taṇhā vibhava taṇhā

original: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ—
analyzed: idam kho pana bhikkhave dukkha nirodham ariya sacca

original: yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho, cāgo, paṭinissaggo, mutti, anālayo.

original: virāgā vimuccati;

analyzed: vimuttasmin vimuttam iti ñāṇam hoti khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti iti

original: Atha kho yaso kulaputto paṭikacceva pabujjhitvā addasa sakaṁ parijanaṁ supantaṁ—

original: Atha kho yaso kulaputto udānaṁ udānesi—

analyzed: mā yasassa kula puttassa koci antarāyam akāsi agārasma anagāriyam pabbajjāya ati

original: Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena nagaradvāraṁ tenupasaṅkami.

original: Amanussā dvāraṁ vivariṁsu—
analyzed: amanussāḥ dvāram

original: “mā yasassa kulaputtassa koci antarāyamakāsi agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjāyā”ti.
analyzed: mā yasassa kula puttassa koci antarāyam akāsi agārasma anagāriyam pabbajjāya ati

original: Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena isipatanaṁ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami.

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati.

original: Addasā kho bhagavā yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ, disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā yasam kula puttam dūratas uva āgacchanta disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavato avidūre udānaṁ udānesi—

original: “upaddutaṁ vata bho, upassaṭṭhaṁ vata bho”ti.
analyzed: upaddutam vata bho upassaṭṭham vata bhoti

original: Atha kho bhagavā yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā yasam kula puttam etat avoca

original: “idaṁ kho, yasa, anupaddutaṁ, idaṁ anupassaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: idam kho yasa anupadduta idam anupassaṭṭha

original: Ehi, yasa, nisīda, dhammaṁ te desessāmī”ti.
analyzed: ehi yasa nisīda dhammam te desessāmi iti

original: Atha kho yaso kulaputto—
analyzed: atha kho yasaḥ kula putto

original: “idaṁ kira anupaddutaṁ, idaṁ anupassaṭṭhan”ti haṭṭho udaggo suvaṇṇapādukāhi orohitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnassa kho yasassa kulaputtassa bhagavā anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnassa kho yasassa kula puttassa bhagavā anupubbim katham kathesi

original: dānakathaṁ sīlakathaṁ saggakathaṁ, kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ okāraṁ saṅkilesaṁ, nekkhamme ānisaṁsaṁ pakāsesi.

original: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ kallacittaṁ, muducittaṁ, vinīvaraṇacittaṁ, udaggacittaṁ, pasannacittaṁ, atha yā buddhānaṁ sāmukkaṁsikā dhammadesanā taṁ pakāsesi—

original: dukkhaṁ, samudayaṁ, nirodhaṁ, maggaṁ.

original: evameva yasassa kulaputtassa tasmiṁyeva āsane virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—

original: “yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamman”ti.

analyzed: atha kho yasassa kula puttassa mātā pāsādam abhiruhitvā yasam kula puttam a passantī yena seṭṭhi gahapati tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā seṭṭhim gahapatim etat avoca

original: “putto te, gahapati, yaso na dissatī”ti.
analyzed: putto te gahapati yasaḥ na dissati iti

original: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati catuddisā assadūte uyyojetvā sāmaṁyeva yena isipatanaṁ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati catuddisā assa dūte uyyojetvā sāmayā iva yena isipatanam migadāyo tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho seṭṭhi gahapati suvaṇṇapādukānaṁ nikkhepaṁ, disvāna taṁyeva anugamāsi.

analyzed: yat nūna aham tathārūpam iddha abhisaṅkhāram abhisaṅkhareyyam yathā seṭṭhi gahapati idha nisinnaḥ idha nisinnam yasam kula puttam na passeyya ati

original: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati—

analyzed: idhā iva kira aham nisinnaḥ idha nisinnam yasam kula puttam passissāmi iti haṭṭhaḥ udaggaḥ bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Sace mahāsamaṇo mahājanakāye iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ karissati, mahāsamaṇassa lābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhissati, mama lābhasakkāro parihāyissati.

original: Aho nūna mahāsamaṇo svātanāya nāgaccheyyā”ti.

analyzed: atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa cetasā cetaḥ upari vitakka maññāya uttarakurum gantvā tatas piṇḍapātam āharitvā paribhuñjitvā tattha iva divāvihāram akāsi

original: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—

analyzed: api ca mayam tam sarāma

analyzed: bhojanīyam ādāya abhikkamissanti sace mahāsamaṇaḥ mahā jana kāye iddhipāṭihāriyam karissati

original: mahāsamaṇassa lābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhissati, mama lābhasakkāro parihāyissati, aho
analyzed: mahāsamaṇassa lābha sakkāro abhivaḍḍhissati mama lābha sakkāro parihāyissati aho

original: So kho ahaṁ, kassapa, tava cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya uttarakuruṁ gantvā tato piṇḍapātaṁ āharitvā anotattadahe paribhuñjitvā tattheva divāvihāraṁ akāsin”ti.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha kassapa tava cetasā cetaḥ upari vitakka maññāya uttarakurum gantvā tatas piṇḍapātam āharitvā paribhuñjitvā tattha iva divāvihāram

original: Atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etadahosi—

original: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma sakkopi devānamindo veyyāvaccaṁ karissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
analyzed: mahiddhikaḥ kho mahā samaṇaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ yatra hi nāma sakkaḥ api devānamindaḥ veyyāvaccam karissati na tu eva ca kho arahā yathā

original: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṁ bhuñjitvā tasmiṁyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā uruvela kassapassa jaṭilassa bhattam bhuñjitvā tasmiyā eva vana saṇḍe vihāsi

original: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocesi—
analyzed: atha kho uruvelakassapaḥ jaṭilaḥ tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavataḥ kālam ārocesi

original: “kālo, mahāsamaṇa, niṭṭhitaṁ bhattan”ti.
analyzed: kālaḥ mahāsamaṇa niṭṭhitam bhattanti

original: “Gaccha tvaṁ, kassapa, āyāmahan”ti uruvelakassapaṁ jaṭilaṁ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā “jambudīpo” paññāyati, tato phalaṁ gahetvā paṭhamataraṁ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdi.
analyzed: gaccha tva kassapa uruvela kassapam jaṭilam uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā jambu dīpo paññāyati tatas phalam gahetvā paṭhamataram āgantvā agya āgāre nisīdi

original: Addasā kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṁ agyāgāre nisinnaṁ, disvāna bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: addasā kho uruvelakassapaḥ jaṭilaḥ bhagavantam agya āgāre nisinna disvāna bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “katamena tvaṁ, mahāsamaṇa, maggena āgato?
analyzed: katamena tva mahāsamaṇa maggena āgato

original: Ahaṁ tayā paṭhamataraṁ pakkanto, so tvaṁ paṭhamataraṁ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno”ti.

analyzed: idha āha kassapa tam uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā jambu dīpo paññāyati tatas phalam gahetvā paṭhamataram āgantvā agya āgāre nisinnaḥ

analyzed: idam nu tva mahā samaṇa ati

original: Atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etadahosi—
analyzed: atha kho uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa etat ahosi

original: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma udakampi na pavāhissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
analyzed: mahiddhikaḥ kho mahā samaṇaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ yatra hi nāma udakam pi na pavāhissati na tu eva ca kho arahā yathā

original: Atha kho bhagavato etadahosi—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavataḥ

original: “cirampi kho imassa moghapurisassa evaṁ bhavissati—
analyzed: ciram pi kho imassa moghapurisassa evam bhavissati

original: ‘mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan’ti;
analyzed: mahiddhikaḥ kho mahā samaṇaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ na tu eva ca kho arahā yathā ahanti

original: yannūnāhaṁ imaṁ jaṭilaṁ saṁvejeyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham imam jaṭilam

original: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṁ jaṭilaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān uruvelakassapam jaṭilam etat avoca

original: “neva ca kho tvaṁ, kassapa, arahā, nāpi arahattamaggasamāpanno.

original: Sāpi te paṭipadā natthi, yāya tvaṁ arahā vā assasi, arahattamaggaṁ vā samāpanno”ti.
analyzed: sā api te paṭipadā natthi yāya tvam arahā vā assasi arahatta maggam vā samāpannaḥ ti

original: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo yena te jaṭilā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā te jaṭile etadavoca—

analyzed: cirapaṭikā bho mahāsamaṇe abhippasannā sace bhava mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyam carissati sabbe iva mayam mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyam carissāma ati

original: “labheyyāma mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyāma upasampadan”ti.
analyzed: labheyyāma bhante bhagavato santike pabbajja labheyyāma upasampadanti

original: “Etha bhikkhavo”ti bhagavā avoca—
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti bhagavā avoca

original: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.

13. Bimbisārasamāgamakathā
analyzed: bimbisāra samāgama kathā

original: Atha kho bhagavā gayāsīse yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena rājagahaṁ tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi, mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ bhikkhusahassena sabbeheva purāṇajaṭilehi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā gayā sīse yathābhirantam viharitvā yena rājagaham tena cārikam pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim bhikkhu sahassena sabbehi iva purāṇa jaṭilehi

original: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena rājagahaṁ tadavasari.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena rājagaham tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati laṭṭhivane suppatiṭṭhe cetiye.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā rājagahe viharati laṭṭhivane suppatiṭṭhe cetiye

original: Assosi kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro—
analyzed: assosi kho rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ

original: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito rājagahaṁ anuppatto rājagahe viharati laṭṭhivane suppatiṭṭhe cetiye.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ khalu bho gotamaḥ sakya putto sakya kulā pabbajitaḥ rājagaham anuppattaḥ rājagahe viharati laṭṭhivane suppatiṭṭhe cetiye

original: Taṁ kho pana bhagavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato—
analyzed: tam kha pana bhagavantam gotamam evam kalyāṇaḥ kitti saddaḥ abbhuggataḥ

original: itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā.
analyzed: iti pi saḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampanno sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussānam buddhaḥ bhagavā

original: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
analyzed: saḥ imam lokam sa devakam sa mārakam sa brahmakam sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇim pajam sa deva manussam sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti

original: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
analyzed: saḥ dhammam deseti ādi kalyāṇam majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāna kalyāṇam sa attham sa byañjanam kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakāseti

original: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṁ arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu kho pana tathārūpānam arahatam dassanam hoti iti

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro dvādasanahutehi māgadhikehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ dvādasa nahutehi māgadhikehi brāhmaṇa gahapatikehi parivutaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Tepi kho dvādasanahutā māgadhikā brāhmaṇagahapatikā appekacce bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā
analyzed: te api kho dvādasa nahutāḥ māgadhikāḥ brāhmaṇa gahapatikāḥ appa ekacce bhagavantam abhivādetvā

original: ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu, appekacce bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu, sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ
analyzed: ekamantam nisīdisu appekacce bhagavatā saddhim sammodisu sammodanīyam

original: sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu, appekacce yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā
analyzed: sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdisu appekacce yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā

original: ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu, appekacce bhagavato santike nāmagottaṁ sāvetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu,
analyzed: ekamantam nisīdisu appekacce bhagavato santike nāma gottam sāvetvā ekamantam nisīdisu

original: appekacce tuṇhībhūtā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: appa ekacce tuṇhībhūtāḥ ekamantam

original: Atha kho tesaṁ dvādasanahutānaṁ māgadhikānaṁ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṁ etadahosi—
analyzed: atha kho tesam dvādasa nahutānam māgadhikānam brāhmaṇa gahapatikānam etat ahosi

original: “kiṁ nu kho mahāsamaṇo uruvelakassape brahmacariyaṁ carati, udāhu uruvelakassapo mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṁ caratī”ti?

original: Sace cīvaraṁ sinnaṁ hoti, muhuttaṁ uṇhe otāpetabbaṁ, na ca uṇhe cīvaraṁ nidahitabbaṁ;
analyzed: sace cīvaram sinnam hoti muhuttam uṇhe otāpetabba na ca uṇhe cīvaram nidahitabba

original: cīvaraṁ saṅgharitabbaṁ, cīvaraṁ saṅgharantena caturaṅgulaṁ kaṇṇaṁ ussāretvā cīvaraṁ saṅgharitabbaṁ—
analyzed: cīvaram saṅgharitabba cīvaram saṅgharantena catur aṅgulam kaṇṇam ussāretvā cīvaram saṅgharitabba

original: mā majjhe bhaṅgo ahosīti.
analyzed: mā majjhe bhaṅgaḥ ahosi iti

original: Obhoge kāyabandhanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: obhoge kāyabandhanam

original: Sace piṇḍapāto hoti, upajjhāyo ca bhuñjitukāmo hoti, udakaṁ datvā piṇḍapāto upanāmetabbo.
analyzed: sace piṇḍapātaḥ hoti upajjhāyaḥ ca bhuñjitu kāmaḥ hoti udakam datvā piṇḍapātaḥ upanāmetabbaḥ

original: Upajjhāyo pānīyena pucchitabbo.
analyzed: upajjhāyaḥ pānīyena pucchitabbo

original: Bhuttāvissa udakaṁ datvā pattaṁ paṭiggahetvā nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena dhovitvā vodakaṁ katvā muhuttaṁ uṇhe otāpetabbo, na ca uṇhe patto nidahitabbo.
analyzed: bhuttāvissa udakam datvā pattam paṭiggahetvā nīcam katvā sādhukam appaṭigha santena dhovitvā vā udakam katvā muhuttam uṇhe otāpetabbaḥ na ca uṇhe pattaḥ nidahitabbaḥ

original: Pattacīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: patta cīvaram

original: Pattaṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattaṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcaṁ vā heṭṭhāpīṭhaṁ vā parāmasitvā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: pattam nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattam gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcam vā heṭṭhā pīṭham vā parāmasitvā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbaḥ

original: Na ca anantarahitāya bhūmiyā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: na ca anantara hitāya bhūmiyā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbo

original: Cīvaraṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaraṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvaravaṁsaṁ vā cīvararajjuṁ vā pamajjitvā pārato antaṁ orato bhogaṁ katvā cīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: cīvaram nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaram gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvara vasam vā cīvara rajjum vā pamajjitvā pāratas antam oratas bhogam katvā cīvaram nikkhipitabba

original: Upajjhāyamhi vuṭṭhite āsanaṁ uddharitabbaṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakathalikaṁ paṭisāmetabbaṁ.
analyzed: upajjhāyamhi vuṭṭhite āsanam uddharitabba pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kathalikam paṭisāmetabba

original: Sace so deso uklāpo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.
analyzed: sace saḥ desaḥ uklāpaḥ hoti saḥ desaḥ sammajjitabbo

original: Sace upajjhāyo nahāyitukāmo hoti, nahānaṁ paṭiyādetabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace upajjhāyaḥ nahāyitu kāmaḥ hoti nahānam

original: Sace sītena attho hoti, sītaṁ paṭiyādetabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace sītena atthaḥ hoti sītam

original: Sace uṇhena attho hoti, uṇhaṁ paṭiyādetabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace uṇhena atthaḥ hoti uṇham

original: Sace upajjhāyo jantāgharaṁ pavisitukāmo hoti, cuṇṇaṁ sannetabbaṁ, mattikā temetabbā,
analyzed: sace upajjhāyaḥ jantāgharam pavisitu kāmaḥ hoti cuṇṇam sannetabba mattikā temetabbā

original: jantāgharapīṭhaṁ ādāya upajjhāyassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvā jantāgharapīṭhaṁ datvā
analyzed: jantāghara pīṭham ādāya upajjhāyassa piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ gantvā jantāghara pīṭham da tvā

original: cīvaraṁ paṭiggahetvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ, cuṇṇaṁ dātabbaṁ, mattikā dātabbā.
analyzed: cīvaram paṭiggahetvā eka mantam nikkhipitabba cuṇṇam dātabba mattikā dātabbā

original: Sace ussahati, jantāgharaṁ pavisitabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace ussahati jantāgharam

original: Jantāgharaṁ pavisantena mattikāya mukhaṁ makkhetvā purato ca pacchato ca paṭicchādetvā jantāgharaṁ pavisitabbaṁ.
analyzed: jantāgharam pavisantena mattikāya mukham makkhetvā puratas ca pacchatas ca paṭicchādetvā jantāgharam pavisitabba

original: Na there bhikkhū anupakhajja nisīditabbaṁ.
analyzed: na there bhikkhū an upakhajja nisīditabba

original: Na navā bhikkhū āsanena paṭibāhitabbā.
analyzed: na navā bhikkhū āsanena paṭibāhitabbā

original: Jantāghare upajjhāyassa parikammaṁ kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: jantāghare upajjhāyassa parikammam

original: Jantāgharā nikkhamantena jantāgharapīṭhaṁ ādāya purato ca pacchato ca paṭicchādetvā jantāgharā nikkhamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: jantāgharā nikkhamantena jantāghara pīṭham ādāya puratas ca pacchatas ca paṭicchādetvā jantāgharā nikkhamitabba

original: Udakepi upajjhāyassa parikammaṁ kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: udake pi upajjhāyassa parikammam

original: Nahātena paṭhamataraṁ uttaritvā attano gattaṁ vodakaṁ katvā nivāsetvā upajjhāyassa
analyzed: nahātena paṭhamataram uttaritvā attanaḥ gattam vā udakam katvā nivāsetvā upajjhāyassa

original: gattato udakaṁ pamajjitabbaṁ, nivāsanaṁ dātabbaṁ, saṅghāṭi dātabbā, jantāgharapīṭhaṁ
analyzed: udakam pamajjitabba nivāsanam dātabba saṅghāṭi dātabbā jantāghara pīṭha

original: ādāya paṭhamataraṁ āgantvā āsanaṁ paññapetabbaṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakathalikaṁ
analyzed: ādāya paṭhamataram āgantvā āsanam paññapetabba pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kathalika

original: upanikkhipitabbaṁ, upajjhāyo pānīyena pucchitabbo.
analyzed: upanikkhipitabbaḥ upajjhāyaḥ pānīyena pucchitabbaḥ

original: Sace uddisāpetukāmo hoti, uddisitabbo.
analyzed: sace uddisā apetu kāmaḥ hoti uddisitabbaḥ

original: Sace paripucchitukāmo hoti, paripucchitabbo.
analyzed: sace paripucchitu kāmaḥ hoti paripucchitabbaḥ

original: Yasmiṁ vihāre upajjhāyo viharati, sace so vihāro uklāpo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo.
analyzed: yasmin vihāre upajjhāyaḥ viharati sace saḥ vihāraḥ uklāpaḥ hoti sace ussahati sodhetabbo

original: Vihāraṁ sodhentena paṭhamaṁ pattacīvaraṁ nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: vihāram sodhentena paṭhamam patta cīvaram nīharitvā eka mantam nikkhipitabba

original: Nisīdanapaccattharaṇaṁ nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: nisīdana paccattharaṇam nīharitvā ekamantam

original: Bhisibibbohanaṁ nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhisi bibbohanam nīharitvā ekamantam nikkhipitabba

original: Mañco nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: mañcaḥ nīcam katvā sādhukam appaṭigha santena a saṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭa piṭṭha nīharitvā ekamantam nikkhipitabbaḥ

original: Pīṭhaṁ nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: pīṭham nīcam katvā sādhukam appaṭigha santena a saṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭa piṭṭha nīharitvā ekamantam nikkhipitabba

original: Mañcapaṭipādakā nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbā.
analyzed: mañca paṭipādakā nīharitvā eka mantam nikkhipitabbā

original: Kheḷamallako nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: kheḷa mallakaḥ nīharitvā eka mantam nikkhipitabbaḥ

original: Apassenaphalakaṁ nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: a passena phalakam nīharitvā ekamantam nikkhipitabba

original: Bhūmattharaṇaṁ yathāpaññattaṁ sallakkhetvā nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhūmattharaṇam yathāpaññattam sallakkhetvā nīharitvā ekamantam nikkhipitabba

original: Sace vihāre santānakaṁ hoti, ullokā paṭhamaṁ ohāretabbaṁ, ālokasandhikaṇṇabhāgā pamajjitabbā.
analyzed: sace vihāre santānakam hoti ullokā paṭhamam ohāretabbaḥ āloka sandhi kaṇṇa bhāgā pamajjitabbā

original: Sace gerukaparikammakatā bhitti kaṇṇakitā hoti, coḷakaṁ temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā.
analyzed: sace geruka parikammakatā bhitti kaṇṇakitā hoti coḷakam temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā

original: Sace kāḷavaṇṇakatā bhūmi kaṇṇakitā hoti, coḷakaṁ temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā.
analyzed: sace kāḷavaṇṇaka tā bhūmi kaṇṇakitā hoti coḷakam temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā

original: Sace akatā hoti bhūmi, udakena paripphositvā sammajjitabbā—
analyzed: sace akatā hoti bhūmi udakena paripphositvā sammajjitabbā

original: mā vihāro rajena uhaññīti.
analyzed: mā vihāraḥ rajena uhaññī iti

original: Saṅkāraṁ vicinitvā ekamantaṁ chaḍḍetabbaṁ.
analyzed: saṅkāram vicinitvā ekamantam

original: Bhūmattharaṇaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhūmattharaṇam otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Mañcapaṭipādakā otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbā.
analyzed: mañca paṭipādakā otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbā

original: Mañco otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbo.
analyzed: mañcaḥ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcam katvā sādhukam appaṭigha santena a saṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭa piṭṭha atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabbaḥ

original: Pīṭhaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: pīṭham otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcam katvā sādhukam appaṭigha santena a saṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭa piṭṭha atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Bhisibibbohanaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhisi bibbohanam otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Nisīdanapaccattharaṇaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: nisīdana paccattharaṇam otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Kheḷamallako otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbo.
analyzed: kheḷamallakaḥ otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbo

original: Apassenaphalakaṁ otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: a passena phalakam otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabba

original: Pattacīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: patta cīvaram

original: Pattaṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattaṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcaṁ vā heṭṭhāpīṭhaṁ vā parāmasitvā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: pattam nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattam gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcam vā heṭṭhā pīṭham vā parāmasitvā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbaḥ

original: Na ca anantarahitāya bhūmiyā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: na ca anantara hitāya bhūmiyā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbo

original: Cīvaraṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaraṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvaravaṁsaṁ vā cīvararajjuṁ vā pamajjitvā pārato antaṁ orato bhogaṁ katvā cīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: cīvaram nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaram gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvara vasam vā cīvara rajjum vā pamajjitvā pāratas antam oratas bhogam katvā cīvaram nikkhipitabba

original: Sace puratthimā sarajā vātā vāyanti, puratthimā vātapānā thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace puratthimā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti puratthimā vāta pānā thaketabbā

original: Sace pacchimā sarajā vātā vāyanti, pacchimā vātapānā thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace pacchimā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti pacchimā vāta pānā thaketabbā

original: Sace uttarā sarajā vātā vāyanti, uttarā vātapānā thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace uttarā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti uttarā vāta pānā thaketabbā

original: Sace dakkhiṇā sarajā vātā vāyanti, dakkhiṇā vātapānā thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace dakkhiṇā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti dakkhiṇā vāta pānā thaketabbā

original: Sace sītakālo hoti, divā vātapānā vivaritabbā, rattiṁ thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace sīta kālaḥ hoti divā vāta pānā vivaritabbā rattim thaketabbā

original: Sace uṇhakālo hoti, divā vātapānā thaketabbā, rattiṁ vivaritabbā.
analyzed: sace uṇha kālaḥ hoti divā vāta pānā thaketabbā rattim vivaritabbā

original: Sace pariveṇaṁ uklāpaṁ hoti, pariveṇaṁ sammajjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace pariveṇam uklāpam hoti pariveṇam sammajjitabba

original: Sace koṭṭhako uklāpo hoti, koṭṭhako sammajjitabbo.
analyzed: sace koṭṭhakaḥ uklāpaḥ hoti koṭṭhakaḥ sammajjitabbaḥ

original: Sace upaṭṭhānasālā uklāpā hoti, upaṭṭhānasālā sammajjitabbā.
analyzed: sace upaṭṭhāna sālā uklāpā hoti upaṭṭhāna sālā sammajjitabbā

original: Sace aggisālā uklāpā hoti, aggisālā sammajjitabbā.
analyzed: sace aggi sālā uklāpā hoti aggi sālā sammajjitabbā

original: Sace vaccakuṭi uklāpā hoti, vaccakuṭi sammajjitabbā.
analyzed: sace vaccakuṭi uklāpā hoti vaccakuṭi sammajjitabbā

original: Sace pānīyaṁ na hoti, pānīyaṁ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace pānīyam na hoti pānīyam upaṭṭhāpetabba

original: Sace paribhojanīyaṁ na hoti, paribhojanīyaṁ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace paribhojanīyam na hoti paribhojanīyam upaṭṭhāpetabba

original: Sace ācamanakumbhiyā udakaṁ na hoti, ācamanakumbhiyā udakaṁ āsiñcitabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace ācamana kumbhiyāḥ udakam na hoti ācamana kumbhiyāḥ udakam

original: Sace upajjhāyassa anabhirati uppannā hoti, saddhivihārikena vūpakāsetabbo, vūpakāsāpetabbo, dhammakathā vāssa kātabbā.
analyzed: sace upajjhāyassa anabhirati uppannā hoti saddhivihārikena vūpakāsetabbaḥ vūpakāsāpetabbaḥ dhamma kathā vā assa kātabbā

original: Sace upajjhāyassa kukkuccaṁ uppannaṁ hoti, saddhivihārikena vinodetabbaṁ, vinodāpetabbaṁ, dhammakathā vāssa kātabbā.
analyzed: sace upajjhāyassa kukkuccam uppannam hoti saddhivihārikena vinodetabba vinodāpetabba dhamma kathā vā assa kātabbā

original: Sace upajjhāyassa diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti, saddhivihārikena vivecetabbaṁ, vivecāpetabbaṁ, dhammakathā vāssa kātabbā.
analyzed: sace upajjhāyassa diṭṭhi gatam uppannam hoti saddhivihārikena dhamma kathā vā assa kātabbā

original: Sace upajjhāyo garudhammaṁ ajjhāpanno hoti parivāsāraho, saddhivihārikena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—
analyzed: sace upajjhāyaḥ garu dhammam ajjhāpannaḥ hoti parivāsa araho saddhivihārikena ussukkam kātabba

original: kinti nu kho saṅgho upajjhāyassa parivāsaṁ dadeyyāti.
analyzed: kinti nu kho saṅghaḥ upajjhāyassa parivāsam dadeyya ati

original: Sace upajjhāyo mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho hoti, saddhivihārikena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—
analyzed: sace upajjhāyaḥ mūlāya paṭikassanā arahaḥ hoti saddhivihārikena ussukkam

original: kinti nu kho saṅgho upajjhāyaṁ mūlāya paṭikasseyyāti.
analyzed: kinti nu kho saṅghaḥ upajjhāyam mūlāya paṭikasseyya ati

original: Sace upajjhāyo mānattāraho hoti, saddhivihārikena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—
analyzed: sace upajjhāyaḥ mānatta arahaḥ hoti saddhivihārikena ussukkam

original: kinti nu kho saṅgho upajjhāyassa mānattaṁ dadeyyāti.
analyzed: kinti nu kho saṅghaḥ upajjhāyassa mānattam dadeyya ati

original: Sace upajjhāyo abbhānāraho hoti, saddhivihārikena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—
analyzed: sace upajjhāyaḥ abbhāna arahaḥ hoti saddhivihārikena ussukkam kātabba

original: kinti nu kho saṅgho upajjhāyaṁ abbheyyāti.
analyzed: kinti nu kho saṅghaḥ upajjhāyam abbheyyāti

original: Sace saṅgho upajjhāyassa kammaṁ kattukāmo hoti tajjanīyaṁ vā niyassaṁ vā pabbājanīyaṁ vā paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā ukkhepanīyaṁ vā, saddhivihārikena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—
analyzed: sace saṅghaḥ upajjhāyassa kammam kattu kāmo hoti tajjanīyam vā niyassam vā pabbājanīyam vā paṭisāraṇīyam vā ukkhepanīyam vā saddhivihārikena ussukkam kātabba

original: kinti nu kho saṅgho upajjhāyassa kammaṁ na kareyya lahukāya vā pariṇāmeyyāti.
analyzed: kinti nu kho saṅghaḥ upajjhāyassa kammam na kareyya lahukāya vā pariṇāmeyya ati

original: Kataṁ vā panassa hoti saṅghena kammaṁ tajjanīyaṁ vā niyassaṁ vā pabbājanīyaṁ vā paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā ukkhepanīyaṁ vā, saddhivihārikena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—
analyzed: katam vā pana assa hoti saṅghena kammam tajjanīyam vā niyassam vā pabbājanīyam vā paṭisāraṇīyam vā ukkhepanīyam vā saddhivihārikena ussukkam kātabba

original: kinti nu kho upajjhāyo sammā vatteyya, lomaṁ pāteyya, netthāraṁ vatteyya, saṅgho taṁ kammaṁ paṭippassambheyyāti.

analyzed: ettāvatā nivattissati iti āsanam pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kathalika

original: Pīṭhaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: pīṭham otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcam katvā sādhukam appaṭigha santena a saṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭa piṭṭha atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Kheḷamallako otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbo.
analyzed: kheḷamallakaḥ otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbo

original: Pattacīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.

original: Pattaṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattaṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcaṁ vā heṭṭhāpīṭhaṁ vā parāmasitvā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: pattam nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattam gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcam vā heṭṭhā pīṭham vā parāmasitvā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbaḥ

original: Na ca anantarahitāya bhūmiyā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: na ca anantara hitāya bhūmiyā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbo

original: Cīvaraṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaraṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvaravaṁsaṁ vā cīvararajjuṁ vā pamajjitvā pārato antaṁ orato bhogaṁ katvā cīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: cīvaram nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaram gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvara vasam vā cīvara rajjum vā pamajjitvā pāratas antam oratas bhogam katvā cīvaram nikkhipitabba

original: Sace puratthimā sarajā vātā vāyanti, puratthimā vātapānā thaketabbā.

original: Sace uttarā sarajā vātā vāyanti, uttarā vātapānā thaketabbā.

original: Sace saddhivihārikassa anabhirati uppannā hoti, upajjhāyena vūpakāsetabbo, vūpakāsāpetabbo, dhammakathā vāssa kātabbā.

original: Sace saddhivihārikassa kukkuccaṁ uppannaṁ hoti, upajjhāyena vinodetabbaṁ, vinodāpetabbaṁ, dhammakathā vāssa kātabbā.

original: Sace saddhivihārikassa diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti, upajjhāyena vivecetabbaṁ, vivecāpetabbaṁ, dhammakathā vāssa kātabbā.

original: Sace saddhivihāriko garudhammaṁ ajjhāpanno hoti parivāsāraho, upajjhāyena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—

original: Sace saddhivihāriko abbhānāraho hoti, upajjhāyena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—

original: Sace saṅgho saddhivihārikassa kammaṁ kattukāmo hoti, tajjanīyaṁ vā niyassaṁ vā pabbājanīyaṁ vā paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā ukkhepanīyaṁ vā, upajjhāyena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—

original: Kataṁ vā panassa hoti saṅghena kammaṁ, tajjanīyaṁ vā niyassaṁ vā pabbājanīyaṁ vā paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā ukkhepanīyaṁ vā, upajjhāyena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—

analyzed: kinti nu kho saddhivihārikassa cīvaram dhoviyetha ati

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato saddhivihāriko nālaṁ paṇāmetuṁ.

original: Upajjhāyamhi adhimattaṁ pemaṁ hoti, adhimatto pasādo hoti, adhimattā hirī hoti, adhimatto gāravo hoti, adhimattā bhāvanā hoti—
analyzed: upajjhāyamhi adhimattam pemam hoti adhimattaḥ pasādaḥ hoti adhimattā hirī hoti adhimattaḥ gāravaḥ hoti adhimattā bhāvanā hoti

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato saddhivihāriko nālaṁ paṇāmetuṁ.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañca haṅgehi samannāgataḥ saddhivihārikaḥ na alam paṇāmetu

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ saddhivihārikaṁ appaṇāmento upajjhāyo sātisāro hoti, paṇāmento anatisāro hoti.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatam saddhivihārikam appaṇāmentaḥ upajjhāyaḥ sa atisāraḥ hoti paṇāmentaḥ an atisāraḥ hoti

original: Upajjhāyamhi nādhimattaṁ pemaṁ hoti, nādhimatto pasādo hoti, nādhimattā hirī hoti, nādhimatto gāravo hoti, nādhimattā bhāvanā hoti—
analyzed: upajjhāyamhi na adhimattam pemam hoti na adhimattaḥ pasādaḥ hoti na adhimattā hirī hoti na adhimattaḥ gāravaḥ hoti na adhimattā bhāvanā hoti

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṁ saddhivihārikaṁ appaṇāmento upajjhāyo sātisāro hoti, paṇāmento anatisāro hoti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañca haṅgehi samannāgatam saddhivihārikam appaṇāmentaḥ upajjhāyaḥ sa atisāraḥ hoti paṇāmentaḥ anatisāraḥ hoti

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ saddhivihārikaṁ paṇāmento upajjhāyo sātisāro hoti, appaṇāmento anatisāro hoti.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatam saddhivihārikam paṇāmentaḥ upajjhāyaḥ sa atisāraḥ hoti a paṇāmentaḥ an atisāraḥ hoti

original: Upajjhāyamhi adhimattaṁ pemaṁ hoti, adhimatto pasādo hoti, adhimattā hirī hoti, adhimatto gāravo hoti, adhimattā bhāvanā hoti—
analyzed: upajjhāyamhi adhimattam pemam hoti adhimattaḥ pasādaḥ hoti adhimattā hirī hoti adhimattaḥ gāravaḥ hoti adhimattā bhāvanā hoti

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṁ saddhivihārikaṁ paṇāmento upajjhāyo sātisāro hoti, appaṇāmento anatisāro hotī”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañca haṅgehi samannāgatam saddhivihārikam paṇāmentaḥ upajjhāyaḥ sa atisāraḥ hoti a paṇāmentaḥ anatisāraḥ hoti iti

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro brāhmaṇo bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjam yāci

original: Taṁ bhikkhū na icchiṁsu pabbājetuṁ.
analyzed: tam bhikkhū naḥ icchisu pabbājetu

original: So bhikkhūsu pabbajjaṁ alabhamāno kiso ahosi lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
analyzed: so bhikkhūsu pabbajjam a labhamānaḥ kisaḥ ahosi lūkhaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātaḥ dhamani santhata gatto

original: Addasā kho bhagavā taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ kisaṁ lūkhaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātaṁ dhamanisanthatagattaṁ, disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā tam brāhmaṇam kisam lūkham dubbaṇṇam uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātam dhamani santhata gatta disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “kiṁ nu kho so, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇo kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho saḥ bhikkhave brāhmaṇaḥ kisaḥ lūkhaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātaḥ dhamani santhata gatto ti

original: “Eso, bhante, brāhmaṇo bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
analyzed: esaḥ bhante brāhmaṇaḥ bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjam yāci

original: Taṁ bhikkhū na icchiṁsu pabbājetuṁ.
analyzed: tam bhikkhū naḥ icchisu pabbājetu

original: So bhikkhūsu pabbajjaṁ alabhamāno kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto”ti.
analyzed: so bhikkhūsu pabbajjam a labhamānaḥ kisaḥ lūkhaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātaḥ dhamani santhata gattaḥ ti

original: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “ko nu kho, bhikkhave, tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṁ sarasī”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu khalu bhikkhave tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāram sarasi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “ahaṁ kho, bhante, tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṁ sarāmī”ti.
analyzed: aham kho bhante tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāram sarāmi iti

original: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, sāriputta, tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṁ sarasī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana tva sāriputta tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāram sarasi iti

original: “Idha me, bhante, so brāhmaṇo rājagahe piṇḍāya carantassa kaṭacchubhikkhaṁ dāpesi.
analyzed: idha me bhante saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantassa kaṭacchu bhikkham dāpesi

original: Imaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṁ sarāmī”ti.
analyzed: imam kho aha bhante tassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāram sarāmi iti

original: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta, kataññuno hi, sāriputta, sappurisā katavedino.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu sāriputta kataññunaḥ hi sāriputta sappurisāḥ kata vedinaḥ

original: Tena hi tvaṁ, sāriputta, taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ pabbājehi upasampādehī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi tva sāriputta tam brāhmaṇam pabbājehi upasampādehi iti

original: “Kathāhaṁ, bhante, taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ pabbājemi upasampādemī”ti?
analyzed: kathā āha bhante tam brāhmaṇam pabbājemi upasampādemi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “yā sā, bhikkhave, mayā tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadā anuññātā, taṁ ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi.
analyzed: yā sā bhikkhave mayā tīhi saraṇa gamanehi upasampadā anuññātā tam ajjatagge paṭikkhipāmi

original: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ñatticatutthena kammena upasampādetuṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave ñatti catutthena kammena upasampādetu

analyzed: yat nūna aham samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyanti

original: na kāyena viññāpeti, na vācāya viññāpeti, na kāyena vācāya viññāpeti, na gahito hoti ācariyo.

original: Antevāsikena, bhikkhave, ācariyamhi sammā vattitabbaṁ.
analyzed: antevāsikena bhikkhave ācariyamhi sammā

original: Tatrāyaṁ sammāvattanā—
analyzed: tatra ayam sammāvattanā

original: Kālasseva uṭṭhāya upāhanaṁ omuñcitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā dantakaṭṭhaṁ dātabbaṁ, mukhodakaṁ dātabbaṁ, āsanaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: kālassa iva uṭṭhāya upāhanam omuñcitvā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā danta kaṭṭham dātabba mukha udakam dātabba āsanam paññapetabba

original: Sace yāgu hoti, bhājanaṁ dhovitvā yāgu upanāmetabbā.
analyzed: sace yāgu hoti bhājanam dhovitvā yāgu upanāmetabbā

original: Yāguṁ pītassa udakaṁ datvā bhājanaṁ paṭiggahetvā nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena dhovitvā paṭisāmetabbaṁ.
analyzed: yāgum pītassa udakam datvā bhājanam paṭiggahetvā nīcam katvā sādhukam a paṭigha santena dhovitvā paṭisāmetabba

original: Ācariyamhi vuṭṭhite āsanaṁ uddharitabbaṁ.
analyzed: ācariyamhi vuṭṭhite āsanam

original: Sace so deso uklāpo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.
analyzed: sace saḥ desaḥ uklāpaḥ hoti saḥ desaḥ sammajjitabbo

original: Sace ācariyo gāmaṁ pavisitukāmo hoti, nivāsanaṁ dātabbaṁ, paṭinivāsanaṁ paṭiggahetabbaṁ, kāyabandhanaṁ dātabbaṁ, saguṇaṁ katvā saṅghāṭiyo dātabbā, dhovitvā patto sodako dātabbo.
analyzed: sace ācariyaḥ gāmam pavisitu kāmaḥ hoti nivāsanam dātabba paṭinivāsanam paṭiggahetabba kāya bandhanam dātabba sa guṇam katvā saṅghāṭiyaḥ dātabbā dhovitvā pattaḥ sa udakaḥ dātabbaḥ

original: Sace ācariyo pacchāsamaṇaṁ ākaṅkhati, timaṇḍalaṁ paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalaṁ nivāsetvā
analyzed: sace ācariyo pacchā samaṇam ākaṅkhati timaṇḍalam paṭicchādentena parimaṇḍalam nivāsetvā

original: kāyabandhanaṁ bandhitvā saguṇaṁ katvā saṅghāṭiyo pārupitvā gaṇṭhikaṁ paṭimuñcitvā
analyzed: kāya bandhanam bandhitvā sa guṇam katvā saṅghāṭiyaḥ pārupitvā gaṇṭhikam paṭimuñcitvā

original: dhovitvā pattaṁ gahetvā ācariyassa pacchāsamaṇena hotabbaṁ.
analyzed: dhovitvā pattam gahetvā ācariyassa pacchā samaṇena

original: Nātidūre gantabbaṁ, nāccāsanne gantabbaṁ, pattapariyāpannaṁ paṭiggahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: na atidūre gantabba na acca āsanne gantabba patta pariyāpannam paṭiggahetabba

original: Na ācariyassa bhaṇamānassa antarantarā kathā opātetabbā.
analyzed: na ācariyassa bhaṇamānassa antarantarā kathā opātetabbā

original: Ācariyo āpattisāmantā bhaṇamāno nivāretabbo.
analyzed: ācariyaḥ āpatti sāmantā bhaṇamānaḥ nivāretabbaḥ

original: Nivattantena paṭhamataraṁ āgantvā āsanaṁ paññapetabbaṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakathalikaṁ
analyzed: nivattantena paṭhamataram āgantvā āsanam paññapetabba pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kathalika

original: upanikkhipitabbaṁ, paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṁ paṭiggahetabbaṁ, paṭinivāsanaṁ dātabbaṁ,
analyzed: upanikkhipitabba paccuggantvā patta cīvaram paṭiggahetabba paṭinivāsanam dātabba

original: nivāsanaṁ paṭiggahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: nivāsanam paṭiggahetabba

original: Sace cīvaraṁ sinnaṁ hoti, muhuttaṁ uṇhe otāpetabbaṁ, na ca uṇhe cīvaraṁ nidahitabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace cīvaram sinnam hoti muhuttam uṇhe otāpetabba na ca uṇhe cīvaram nidahitabba

original: Cīvaraṁ saṅgharitabbaṁ.
analyzed: cīvaram

original: Cīvaraṁ saṅgharantena caturaṅgulaṁ kaṇṇaṁ ussāretvā cīvaraṁ saṅgharitabbaṁ—
analyzed: cīvaram saṅgharantena catur aṅgulam kaṇṇam ussāretvā cīvaram

original: mā majjhe bhaṅgo ahosīti.
analyzed: mā majjhe bhaṅgaḥ ahosi iti

original: Obhoge kāyabandhanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: obhoge kāyabandhanam

original: Sace piṇḍapāto hoti, ācariyo ca bhuñjitukāmo hoti, udakaṁ datvā piṇḍapāto upanāmetabbo.
analyzed: sace piṇḍapātaḥ hoti ācariyaḥ ca bhuñjitu kāmaḥ hoti udakam datvā piṇḍapātaḥ upanāmetabbo

original: Ācariyo pānīyena pucchitabbo.
analyzed: ācariyaḥ pānīyena pucchitabbo

original: Bhuttāvissa udakaṁ datvā pattaṁ paṭiggahetvā nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena dhovitvā vodakaṁ katvā muhuttaṁ uṇhe otāpetabbo, na ca uṇhe patto nidahitabbo.
analyzed: bhuttāvissa udakam datvā pattam paṭiggahetvā nīcam katvā sādhukam appaṭigha santena dhovitvā vā udakam katvā muhuttam uṇhe otāpetabbaḥ na ca uṇhe pattaḥ nidahitabbaḥ

original: Pattacīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: patta cīvaram

original: Pattaṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattaṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcaṁ vā heṭṭhāpīṭhaṁ vā parāmasitvā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: pattam nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattam gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcam vā heṭṭhā pīṭham vā parāmasitvā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbaḥ

original: Na ca anantarahitāya bhūmiyā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: na ca anantara hitāya bhūmiyā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbo

original: Cīvaraṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaraṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvaravaṁsaṁ vā cīvararajjuṁ vā pamajjitvā pārato antaṁ orato bhogaṁ katvā cīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: cīvaram nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaram gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvara vasam vā cīvara rajjum vā pamajjitvā pāratas antam oratas bhogam katvā cīvaram nikkhipitabba

original: Ācariyamhi vuṭṭhite āsanaṁ uddharitabbaṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakathalikaṁ paṭisāmetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ācariyamhi vuṭṭhite āsanam uddharitabba pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kathalikam paṭisāmetabba

original: Sace so deso uklāpo hoti, so deso sammajjitabbo.
analyzed: sace saḥ desaḥ uklāpaḥ hoti saḥ desaḥ sammajjitabbo

original: Sace ācariyo nahāyitukāmo hoti, nahānaṁ paṭiyādetabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace ācariyaḥ nahāyitu kāmaḥ hoti nahānam

original: Sace sītena attho hoti, sītaṁ paṭiyādetabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace sītena atthaḥ hoti sītam

original: Sace uṇhena attho hoti, uṇhaṁ paṭiyādetabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace uṇhena atthaḥ hoti uṇham

original: Sace ācariyo jantāgharaṁ pavisitukāmo hoti, cuṇṇaṁ sannetabbaṁ, mattikā temetabbā,
analyzed: sace ācariyaḥ jantāgharam pavisitu kāmaḥ hoti cuṇṇam sannetabba mattikā temetabbā

original: jantāgharapīṭhaṁ ādāya ācariyassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvā jantāgharapīṭhaṁ datvā
analyzed: jantāghara pīṭham ādāya ācariyassa piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ gantvā jantāghara pīṭham da tvā

original: cīvaraṁ paṭiggahetvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ, cuṇṇaṁ dātabbaṁ, mattikā dātabbā.
analyzed: cīvaram paṭiggahetvā eka mantam nikkhipitabba cuṇṇam dātabba mattikā dātabbā

original: Sace ussahati, jantāgharaṁ pavisitabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace ussahati jantāgharam

original: Jantāgharaṁ pavisantena mattikāya mukhaṁ makkhetvā purato ca pacchato ca paṭicchādetvā jantāgharaṁ pavisitabbaṁ.
analyzed: jantāgharam pavisantena mattikāya mukham makkhetvā puratas ca pacchatas ca paṭicchādetvā jantāgharam pavisitabba

original: Na there bhikkhū anupakhajja nisīditabbaṁ.
analyzed: na there bhikkhū an upakhajja nisīditabba

original: Na navā bhikkhū āsanena paṭibāhitabbā.
analyzed: na navā bhikkhū āsanena paṭibāhitabbā

original: Jantāghare ācariyassa parikammaṁ kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: jantāghare ācariyassa parikammam

original: Jantāgharā nikkhamantena jantāgharapīṭhaṁ ādāya purato ca pacchato ca paṭicchādetvā jantāgharā nikkhamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: jantāgharā nikkhamantena jantāghara pīṭham ādāya puratas ca pacchatas ca paṭicchādetvā jantāgharā nikkhamitabba

original: Udakepi ācariyassa parikammaṁ kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: udake pi ācariyassa parikammam

original: Nahātena paṭhamataraṁ uttaritvā attano gattaṁ vodakaṁ katvā nivāsetvā ācariyassa
analyzed: nahātena paṭhamataram uttaritvā attanaḥ gattam vā udakam katvā nivāsetvā ācariyassa

original: gattato udakaṁ pamajjitabbaṁ, nivāsanaṁ dātabbaṁ, saṅghāṭi dātabbā, jantāgharapīṭhaṁ
analyzed: udakam pamajjitabba nivāsanam dātabba saṅghāṭi dātabbā jantāghara pīṭha

original: ādāya paṭhamataraṁ āgantvā āsanaṁ paññapetabbaṁ, pādodakaṁ pādapīṭhaṁ pādakathalikaṁ upanikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: ādāya paṭhamataram āgantvā āsanam paññapetabba pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kathalikam upanikkhipitabba

original: Ācariyo pānīyena pucchitabbo.
analyzed: ācariyaḥ pānīyena pucchitabbo

original: Sace uddisāpetukāmo hoti, uddisāpetabbo.
analyzed: sace uddisā apetu kāmaḥ hoti uddisā apetabbaḥ

original: Sace paripucchitukāmo hoti, paripucchitabbo.
analyzed: sace paripucchitu kāmaḥ hoti paripucchitabbaḥ

original: Yasmiṁ vihāre ācariyo viharati, sace so vihāro uklāpo hoti, sace ussahati, sodhetabbo.
analyzed: yasmin vihāre ācariyaḥ viharati sace saḥ vihāraḥ uklāpaḥ hoti sace ussahati sodhetabbo

original: Vihāraṁ sodhentena paṭhamaṁ pattacīvaraṁ nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ;
analyzed: vihāram sodhentena paṭhamam patta cīvaram nīharitvā eka mantam nikkhipitabba

original: bhisibibbohanaṁ nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ;
analyzed: bhisi bibbohanam nīharitvā ekamantam nikkhipitabba

original: mañco nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbo;

original: pīṭhaṁ nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ;
analyzed: pīṭham nīcam katvā sādhukam appaṭigha santena a saṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭa piṭṭha nīharitvā ekamantam nikkhipitabba

analyzed: mañca paṭipādakā nīharitvā eka mantam nikkhipitabbā

original: kheḷamallako nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbo;

original: apassenaphalakaṁ nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ;

original: bhūmattharaṇaṁ yathāpaññattaṁ sallakkhetvā nīharitvā ekamantaṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhūmattharaṇam yathāpaññattam sallakkhetvā nīharitvā ekamantam nikkhipitabba

original: Sace vihāre santānakaṁ hoti, ullokā paṭhamaṁ ohāretabbaṁ, ālokasandhikaṇṇabhāgā pamajjitabbā.
analyzed: sace vihāre santānakam hoti ullokā paṭhamam ohāretabbaḥ āloka sandhi kaṇṇa bhāgā pamajjitabbā

original: Sace gerukaparikammakatā bhitti kaṇṇakitā hoti, coḷakaṁ temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā.
analyzed: sace geruka parikammakatā bhitti kaṇṇakitā hoti coḷakam temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā

original: Sace kāḷavaṇṇakatā bhūmi kaṇṇakitā hoti, coḷakaṁ temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā.
analyzed: sace kāḷavaṇṇaka tā bhūmi kaṇṇakitā hoti coḷakam temetvā pīḷetvā pamajjitabbā

original: Sace akatā hoti bhūmi, udakena paripphositvā sammajjitabbā—
analyzed: sace akatā hoti bhūmi udakena paripphositvā sammajjitabbā

original: mā vihāro rajena uhaññīti.
analyzed: mā vihāraḥ rajena uhaññī iti

original: Saṅkāraṁ vicinitvā ekamantaṁ chaḍḍetabbaṁ.
analyzed: saṅkāram vicinitvā ekamantam

original: Bhūmattharaṇaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhūmattharaṇam otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Mañcapaṭipādakā otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbā.
analyzed: mañca paṭipādakā otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbā

original: Mañco otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbo.

original: Pīṭhaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.

original: Bhisibibbohanaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhisi bibbohanam otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Nisīdanapaccattharaṇaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: nisīdana paccattharaṇam otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Kheḷamallako otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbo.
analyzed: kheḷamallakaḥ otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbo

original: Apassenaphalakaṁ otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: a passena phalakam otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabba

original: Pattacīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: patta cīvaram

original: Pattaṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattaṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcaṁ vā heṭṭhāpīṭhaṁ vā parāmasitvā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: pattam nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattam gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcam vā heṭṭhā pīṭham vā parāmasitvā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbaḥ

original: Na ca anantarahitāya bhūmiyā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: na ca anantara hitāya bhūmiyā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbo

original: Cīvaraṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaraṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvaravaṁsaṁ vā cīvararajjuṁ vā pamajjitvā pārato antaṁ orato bhogaṁ katvā cīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: cīvaram nikkhipantena ekena hatthena cīvaram gahetvā ekena hatthena cīvara vasam vā cīvara rajjum vā pamajjitvā pāratas antam oratas bhogam katvā cīvaram nikkhipitabba

original: Sace puratthimā sarajā vātā vāyanti, puratthimā vātapānā thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace puratthimā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti puratthimā vāta pānā thaketabbā

original: Sace pacchimā sarajā vātā vāyanti, pacchimā vātapānā thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace pacchimā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti pacchimā vāta pānā thaketabbā

original: Sace uttarā sarajā vātā vāyanti, uttarā vātapānā thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace uttarā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti uttarā vāta pānā thaketabbā

original: Sace dakkhiṇā sarajā vātā vāyanti, dakkhiṇā vātapānā thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace dakkhiṇā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti dakkhiṇā vāta pānā thaketabbā

original: Sace sītakālo hoti, divā vātapānā vivaritabbā, rattiṁ thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace sīta kālaḥ hoti divā vāta pānā vivaritabbā rattim thaketabbā

original: Sace uṇhakālo hoti, divā vātapānā thaketabbā, rattiṁ vivaritabbā.
analyzed: sace uṇha kālaḥ hoti divā vāta pānā thaketabbā rattim vivaritabbā

original: Sace pariveṇaṁ uklāpaṁ hoti, pariveṇaṁ sammajjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: sace pariveṇam uklāpam hoti pariveṇam sammajjitabba

original: Sace koṭṭhako uklāpo hoti, koṭṭhako sammajjitabbo.
analyzed: sace koṭṭhakaḥ uklāpaḥ hoti koṭṭhakaḥ sammajjitabbaḥ

analyzed: sace vaccakuṭi uklāpā hoti vaccakuṭi sammajjitabbā

original: Sace pānīyaṁ na hoti, pānīyaṁ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṁ.

original: Sace paribhojanīyaṁ na hoti, paribhojanīyaṁ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṁ.

analyzed: ettāvatā nivattissati iti āsanam pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kathalika

original: nivāsanaṁ paṭiggahetabbaṁ.

analyzed: bhūmattharaṇam yathāpaññattam sallakkhetvā nīharitvā ekamantam nikkhipitabba

analyzed: mā vihāraḥ rajena uhaññī iti

original: Pīṭhaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcaṁ katvā sādhukaṁ appaṭighaṁsantena, asaṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭapiṭṭhaṁ, atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: pīṭham otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā nīcam katvā sādhukam appaṭigha santena a saṅghaṭṭentena kavāṭa piṭṭha atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Bhisibibbohanaṁ otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattaṁ paññapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhisi bibbohanam otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

analyzed: nisīdana paccattharaṇam otāpetvā sodhetvā papphoṭetvā atiharitvā yathāpaññattam paññapetabba

original: Kheḷamallako otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbo.
analyzed: kheḷamallakaḥ otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbo

original: Apassenaphalakaṁ otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabbaṁ.
analyzed: a passena phalakam otāpetvā pamajjitvā atiharitvā yathāṭhāne ṭhapetabba

original: Pattacīvaraṁ nikkhipitabbaṁ.
analyzed: patta cīvaram

original: Pattaṁ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattaṁ gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcaṁ vā heṭṭhāpīṭhaṁ vā parāmasitvā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: pattam nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattam gahetvā ekena hatthena heṭṭhāmañcam vā heṭṭhā pīṭham vā parāmasitvā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbaḥ

original: Na ca anantarahitāya bhūmiyā patto nikkhipitabbo.
analyzed: na ca anantara hitāya bhūmiyā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbo

original: Sace puratthimā sarajā vātā vāyanti, puratthimā vātapānā thaketabbā.
analyzed: sace puratthimā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti puratthimā vāta pānā thaketabbā

analyzed: sace pacchimā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti pacchimā vāta pānā thaketabbā

analyzed: sace uttarā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti uttarā vāta pānā thaketabbā

analyzed: sace dakkhiṇā sarajāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti dakkhiṇā vāta pānā thaketabbā

analyzed: sace upaṭṭhāna sālā uklāpā hoti upaṭṭhāna sālā sammajjitabbā

original: Sace paribhojanīyaṁ na hoti, paribhojanīyaṁ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṁ.

original: Sace antevāsikassa anabhirati uppannā hoti, ācariyena vūpakāsetabbo, vūpakāsāpetabbo, dhammakathā vāssa kātabbā.

analyzed: sace antevāsikassa kukkuccam uppannam hoti ācariyena dhamma kathā vā assa kātabbā

original: Sace antevāsikassa diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti, ācariyena vivecetabbaṁ, vivecāpetabbaṁ, dhammakathā vāssa kātabbā.

original: Sace antevāsiko abbhānāraho hoti, ācariyena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—

original: Sace saṅgho antevāsikassa kammaṁ kattukāmo hoti, tajjanīyaṁ vā niyassaṁ vā pabbājanīyaṁ vā paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā ukkhepanīyaṁ vā, ācariyena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—

original: Kataṁ vā panassa hoti saṅghena kammaṁ, tajjanīyaṁ vā niyassaṁ vā pabbājanīyaṁ vā paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā ukkhepanīyaṁ vā, ācariyena ussukkaṁ kātabbaṁ—

original: Sace antevāsikassa cīvaraṁ rajitabbaṁ hoti, ācariyena ācikkhitabbaṁ—‘evaṁ rajeyyāsī’ti,

analyzed: paṇāmemi tat ti vā māyidha paṭikkamīti vā nīhara te patta cīvaranti vā na aham tayā upaṭṭhātabbā iti vā

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgataṁ antevāsikaṁ appaṇāmento ācariyo sātisāro hoti, paṇāmento anatisāro hoti.

original: Ācariyamhi nādhimattaṁ pemaṁ hoti, nādhimatto pasādo hoti, nādhimattā hirī hoti, nādhimatto gāravo hoti, nādhimattā bhāvanā hoti—

original: 21. Bālaabyattavatthu
analyzed: bāla a byatta vatthu

analyzed: dissanti ācariyā bālā antevāsikā paṇḍitā

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū—dasavassamhā dasavassamhāti—bālā abyattā nissayaṁ dassanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhū dasa vassamhāḥ dasa vassamhā ati bālāḥ abyattāḥ nissayam dassanti

original: Dissanti ācariyā bālā antevāsikā paṇḍitā, dissanti ācariyā abyattā antevāsikā byattā,
analyzed: dissanti ācariyāḥ bālāḥ antevāsikā paṇḍitāḥ dissanti ācariyāḥ abyattāḥ antevāsikā byattā

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū—
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhū

original: bālā abyattā nissayaṁ denti …pe…

original: “saccaṁ, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: sat ca bhagavān ati

original: Vigarahi buddho bhagavā …pe…

original: vigarahitvā …pe…

analyzed: yaḥ dadeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: 22. Nissayapaṭippassaddhikathā

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ācariyupajjhāyesu pakkantesupi vibbhantesupi kālaṅkatesupi pakkhasaṅkantesupi nissayapaṭippassaddhiyo na jānanti.

analyzed: upajjhāyaḥ pakkantaḥ vā hoti vibbhantaḥ vā kālaṅkataḥ vā pakkha saṅkantaḥ vā āṇattiyā iva pañcamī

analyzed: ācariyo pakkantaḥ vā hoti vibbhantaḥ vā kālaṅkataḥ vā pakkha saṅkantaḥ vā āṇattiyā iva pañcamī upajjhāyena vā samodhāna gataḥ hoti

original: Nissayapaṭippassaddhikathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nissaya paṭippassaddhi kathā niṭṭhitā

original: 23. Upasampādetabbapañcaka
Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabba na nissayaḥ dātabbaḥ na sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbaḥ

original: Na asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na asekkhena samādhikkhandhena samannāgato
analyzed: na asekkhena sīla kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti na asekkhena samādhi kkhandhena samannāgataḥ

original: hoti, na asekkhena paññākkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena
analyzed: hoti na asekkhena paññā kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti na asekkhena vimutti kkhandhena

original: samannāgato hoti, na asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti—
analyzed: samannāgataḥ hoti na asekkhena vimutti ñāṇa dassana kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabba na nissayaḥ dātabbaḥ na sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbaḥ

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṁ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayaḥ dātabbo sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbo

original: Asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, asekkhena samādhikkhandhena samannāgato
analyzed: asekkhena sīla kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti asekkhena samādhi kkhandhena samannāgataḥ

analyzed: hoti asekkhena paññā kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti asekkhena vimutti kkhandhena samannāgataḥ

original: hoti, asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti—
analyzed: hoti asekkhena vimutti ñāṇa dassana khandhena samannāgataḥ hoti

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṁ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayaḥ dātabbo sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbo

original: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: aparehi pi bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabba na nissayaḥ dātabbaḥ na sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbaḥ

original: Attanā na asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na paraṁ asekkhe sīlakkhandhe samādapetā;
analyzed: attanā na asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti na param asekkhe sīlakkhandhe samādapetā

analyzed: attanā na asekkhena samādhi kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti na param asekkhe samādhi kkhandhe samādapetā

original: attanā na asekkhena paññākkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na paraṁ asekkhe paññākkhandhe samādapetā;
analyzed: attanā na asekkhena paññā kkhandhena samannāgataḥ hoti na param asekkhe paññā kkhandhe samādapetā

original: attanā na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena samannāgato hoti, na paraṁ asekkhe vimuttikkhandhe samādapetā;

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabba na nissayaḥ dātabbaḥ na sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbaḥ

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṁ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayaḥ dātabbo sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbo

original: Attanā asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti, paraṁ asekkhe sīlakkhandhe samādapetā;

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṁ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayaḥ dātabbo sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbo

original: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: aparehi pi bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabba na nissayaḥ dātabbaḥ na sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbaḥ

original: Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, muṭṭhassati hoti—

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabba na nissayaḥ dātabbaḥ na sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbaḥ

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṁ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayaḥ dātabbo sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbo

original: Saddho hoti, hirimā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, upaṭṭhitassati hoti—
analyzed: saddhaḥ hoti hirimā hoti ottappī hoti āraddha vīriyaḥ hoti upaṭṭhita sati hoti

original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṁ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayaḥ dātabbo sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbo

original: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: aparehi pi bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabba na nissayaḥ dātabbaḥ na sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbaḥ

original: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti, appassuto hoti, duppañño hoti—
