original: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṁ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabba na nissayaḥ dātabbaḥ na sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbaḥ

original: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṁ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
analyzed: pañcahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayaḥ dātabbo sāmaṇeraḥ upaṭṭhāpetabbo

original: Na adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, na ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, na atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti, bahussuto hoti, paññavā hoti—

original: 25. Aññatitthiyapubbakathā
analyzed: añña titthiya pubba kathā

original: Tena kho pana samayena yo so aññatitthiyapubbo upajjhāyena sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno upajjhāyassa vādaṁ āropetvā taṁyeva titthāyatanaṁ saṅkami.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena yaḥ saḥ añña titthiya pubbaḥ upajjhāyena sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ upajjhāyassa vādam āropetvā tayā iva tittha āyatanam saṅkami

original: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṁ yāci.
analyzed: so puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadam yāci

original: Bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhū bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

original: “Yo so, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo upajjhāyena sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno upajjhāyassa vādaṁ āropetvā taṁyeva titthāyatanaṁ saṅkanto, so āgato na upasampādetabbo.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ upajjhāyena sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ upajjhāyassa vādam āropetvā tayā iva tittha āyatanam saṅkanto saḥ āgataḥ na upasampādetabbaḥ

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṁ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṁ, tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabbo.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave aññaḥ api añña titthiya pubbaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajje ākaṅkhati upasampadā tassa cattāraḥ māse parivāsaḥ dātabbaḥ

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, dātabbo—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave dātabbaḥ

original: Saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi.
analyzed: saṅgham saraṇam gacchāmi

analyzed: dutiyam pi buddham saraṇam gacchāmi

analyzed: dutiyam pi dhammam saraṇam gacchāmi

analyzed: dutiyam pi saṅgham saraṇam gacchāmi

analyzed: saṅgham saraṇam gacchāmi iti

original: Tena, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbena saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
analyzed: tena bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbena saṅgham upasaṅkamitvā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā bhikkhūnam pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikam nisīditvā añjalim paggahetvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘ahaṁ, bhante, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhāmi upasampadaṁ.
analyzed: aha bhante añña titthiya pubbaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye ākaṅkhāmi upasampadā

original: Sohaṁ, bhante, saṅghaṁ cattāro māse parivāsaṁ yācāmī’ti.
analyzed: sā uha bhante saṅgham cattāraḥ māse parivāsam yācāmi iti

original: Dutiyampi yācitabbo.

analyzed: tatiyam pi yācitabbaḥ

original: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—

original: ‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho.

analyzed: ayam itthannāmaḥ añña titthiya pubbaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye ākaṅkhati upasampadā

original: So saṅghaṁ cattāro māse parivāsaṁ yācati.

analyzed: yadi saṅghassa patta kallam saṅghaḥ itthannāmassa añña titthiya pubbassa cattāraḥ māse parivāsam dadeyya

analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ

original: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsassa dānaṁ, so tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayasmataḥ khamati itthannāmassa añña titthiya pubbassa cattāraḥ māse parivāsassa so tuṇhassa

original: yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
analyzed: yassa na khamati saḥ bhāseyya

original: Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāso.
analyzed: dinnaḥ saṅghena itthannāmassa añña titthiya pubbassa cattāraḥ māse parivāsaḥ

original: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo ārādhako hoti, evaṁ anārādhako.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ ārādhakaḥ hoti evam an ārādhakaḥ

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo anārādhako hoti?
analyzed: katham ca bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ anārādhakaḥ hoti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo atikālena gāmaṁ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ atikālena gāmam pavisati atidivā paṭikkamati

original: Evampi, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo anārādhako hoti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ anārādhakaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo vesiyāgocaro vā hoti, vidhavāgocaro vā hoti, thullakumārikāgocaro vā hoti, paṇḍakagocaro vā hoti, bhikkhunigocaro vā hoti.

original: Evampi, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo anārādhako hoti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ anārādhakaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṁ uccāvacāni karaṇīyāni,
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnam uccāvacāni karaṇīyāni

original: tattha na dakkho hoti, na analaso, na tatrupāyāya vīmaṁsāya samannāgato, na alaṁ
analyzed: tattha na dakkhaḥ hoti na analasaḥ na tatrupāyāya vīmasāya samannāgataḥ na

analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ anārādhakaḥ hoti

analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ anārādhakaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yassa titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti, tassa

analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave añña titthiya pubbaḥ ārādhakaḥ hoti

original: Jīvako komārabhacco ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—

original: Atha kho bhagavā jīvakaṁ komārabhaccaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.

original: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.

original: Kena nu kho mayaṁ upāyena pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇañca kareyyāmā”ti?
analyzed: kena nu khalu mayam upāyena pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇam ca kareyyāma ati

original: Atha kho tesaṁ yodhānaṁ etadahosi—
analyzed: atha kho tesam yodhānam etat ahosi

original: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
analyzed: ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhamma cārinaḥ sama cārinaḥ brahmacārinaḥ sacca vādinaḥ sīlavantaḥ kalyāṇa dhammā

original: Sace kho mayaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyāma, evaṁ mayaṁ pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇañca kareyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: sace kho mayam samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyāma evam mayam pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇañca kareyyāma ati

original: Atha kho te yodhā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāciṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te yodhāḥ bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjam yācisu

original: Te bhikkhū pabbājesuṁ, upasampādesuṁ.
analyzed: te bhikkhū pabbājesu upasampādesu

original: Senānāyakā mahāmattā rājabhaṭe pucchiṁsu—
analyzed: senā nāyakāḥ mahā mattāḥ rāja bhaṭe pucchisu

original: “kiṁ nu kho, bhaṇe, itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca yodhā na dissantī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho bhaṇe itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca yodhāḥ na dissanti iti

original: “Itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca, sāmi, yodhā bhikkhūsu pabbajitā”ti.
analyzed: itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca sāmi yodhā bhikkhūsu pabbajitā

original: Senānāyakā mahāmattā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: senā nāyakāḥ mahāmattāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā rājabhaṭaṁ pabbājessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇāḥ sakyaputtiyāḥ rāja bhaṭam pabbājessanti iti

original: Senānāyakā mahāmattā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: senānāyakāḥ mahāmattāḥ raññaḥ māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro vohārike mahāmatte pucchi—
analyzed: atha kho rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ vohārike mahāmatte pucchi

original: “yo, bhaṇe, rājabhaṭaṁ pabbājeti, kiṁ so pasavatī”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ bhaṇe rāja bhaṭam pabbājeti kim so pasavati iti

original: “Upajjhāyassa, deva, sīsaṁ chetabbaṁ, anussāvakassa jivhā uddharitabbā, gaṇassa upaḍḍhaphāsukā bhañjitabbā”ti.
analyzed: upajjhāyassa deva sīsam chetabba anussāvakassa jivhā uddharitabbā gaṇassa upaḍḍha phāsukā bhañjitabbā ati

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavantaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “santi, bhante, rājāno assaddhā appasannā.
analyzed: santi bhante rājānaḥ assaddhāḥ appasannā

original: Te appamattakenapi bhikkhū viheṭheyyuṁ.
analyzed: te appamattakena api bhikkhū viheṭheyyu

original: Sādhu, bhante, ayyā rājabhaṭaṁ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante ayyāḥ rājabhaṭam na pabbājeyyunti

original: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā rājānam māgadham seniyam bimbisāram dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “na, bhikkhave, rājabhaṭo pabbājetabbo.
analyzed: na bhikkhave rāja bhaṭaḥ pabbājetabbaḥ

original: Yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pabbājeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa ati

original: 28. Aṅgulimālacoravatthu
analyzed: aṅguli māla coravatthu

original: Manussā passitvā ubbijjantipi, uttasantipi, palāyantipi, aññenapi gacchanti, aññenapi mukhaṁ karonti, dvārampi thakenti.

analyzed: manussāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

analyzed: na bhikkhave dhaja bandhaḥ coraḥ pabbājetabbaḥ

original: Yo pabbājeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pabbājeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa ati

analyzed: kārabhedaka coravatthu

original: “nassa, paṇḍaka, vinassa, paṇḍaka, ko tayā attho”ti.
analyzed: nassa paṇḍaka vinassa paṇḍaka kaḥ tayā attho ti

original: So sāmaṇerehi apasādito hatthibhaṇḍe assabhaṇḍe upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeti—

analyzed: evam ime sabbe eva abrahmacārino ti

analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam hatthi bhaṇḍānam assa bhaṇḍānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentānam

original: Atha kho tassa purāṇakulaputtassa khīṇakolaññassa etadahosi—
analyzed: atha kho tassa purāṇa kula puttassa khīṇa kolaññassa etat ahosi

original: Yannūnāhaṁ sāmaṁ pattacīvaraṁ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ saṁvaseyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham sāmam patta cīvaram paṭiyādetvā kesa massum ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmam gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhim savaseyyanti

original: Atha kho so purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño sāmaṁ pattacīvaraṁ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṁ gantvā bhikkhū abhivādeti.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ purāṇa kula puttaḥ khīṇa kolaññaḥ sāmam patta cīvaram paṭiyādetvā kesa massum ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmam gantvā bhikkhū abhivādeti

original: Bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
analyzed: bhikkhū evam āhasu

analyzed: kim ete āvuso kativassaḥ nāma ati

analyzed: kaḥ pana te āvuso upajjhāyaḥ ti

analyzed: kim ete āvuso upajjhāyaḥ nāma ati

original: Bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ upāliṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: bhikkhū āyasmantam upālim etat avocuḥ

analyzed: atha kho saḥ purāṇa kula puttaḥ khīṇa kolaññaḥ āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ etam attham ārocesi

original: Āyasmā upāli bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: āyasmai upāli bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhū bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

original: “Theyyasaṁvāsako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti.
analyzed: theyyasavāsakaḥ bhikkhave anupasampannaḥ na upasampādetabbaḥ upasampannaḥ na āsetabbaḥ ti

original: Titthiyapakkantako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
analyzed: titthiya pakkantakaḥ bhikkhave anupasampannaḥ na upasampādetabbaḥ upasampannaḥ na āsetabbaḥ ti

original: 49. Tiracchānagatavatthu
analyzed: tiracchāna gata vatthu

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro nāgo nāgayoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ nāgaḥ nāga yoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati

original: Atha kho tassa nāgassa etadahosi—
analyzed: atha kho tassa nāgassa etat ahosi

original: “kena nu kho ahaṁ upāyena nāgayoniyā ca parimucceyyaṁ khippañca manussattaṁ paṭilabheyyan”ti.
analyzed: kena nu kho aham upāyena nāga yoniyā ca parimucceyyam khippam ca manussattam paṭilabheyyanti

original: Atha kho tassa nāgassa etadahosi—
analyzed: atha kho tassa nāgassa etat ahosi

original: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
analyzed: ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhamma cārinaḥ sama cārinaḥ brahmacārinaḥ sacca vādinaḥ sīlavantaḥ kalyāṇa dhammā

original: Sace kho ahaṁ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṁ, evāhaṁ nāgayoniyā ca parimucceyyaṁ, khippañca manussattaṁ paṭilabheyyan”ti.
analyzed: sace kho aham samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya eva aham nāga yoniyā ca parimucceyya khippam ca manussattam paṭilabheyyanti

original: Atha kho so nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ māṇavaka vaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjam yāci

original: Taṁ bhikkhū pabbājesuṁ, upasampādesuṁ.
analyzed: tam bhikkhū pabbājesu upasampādesu

original: Tena kho pana samayena so nāgo aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ paccantime vihāre paṭivasati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena saḥ nāgaḥ aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhim paccantime vihāre paṭivasati

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsa samayam paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati

original: Atha kho so nāgo tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭho niddaṁ okkami.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭhaḥ niddam okkami

original: Sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā honti.
analyzed: sabbaḥ vihāraḥ ahinā puṇṇaḥ vāta pānehi bhogāḥ nikkhantāḥ honti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu vihāraṁ pavisissāmīti kavāṭaṁ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṁ vihāraṁ ahinā puṇṇaṁ, vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante, disvāna bhīto vissaramakāsi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu vihāram pavisissāmi iti kavāṭam paṇāmentaḥ addasa sabbam vihāram ahinā puṇṇa vāta pānehi bhoge nikkhante disvāna bhītaḥ vissaram akāsi

original: Bhikkhū upadhāvitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: bhikkhū upadhāvitvā tam bhikkhum etat avocuḥ

original: “kissa tvaṁ, āvuso, vissaramakāsī”ti?
analyzed: kissa tvaṃ āvuso vissaram akāsi iti

original: “Ayaṁ, āvuso, sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā”ti.
analyzed: ayaṃ āvuso sabbaḥ vihāraḥ ahinā puṇṇaḥ vāta pānehi bhogāḥ nikkhantā ati

original: Atha kho so nāgo tena saddena paṭibujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ tena saddena paṭibujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi

original: Bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
analyzed: bhikkhū evam āhasu

original: “kosi tvaṁ, āvuso”ti?
analyzed: kā asi tvam āvuso iti

original: “Ahaṁ, bhante, nāgo”ti.
analyzed: aha bhante nāgā iti

analyzed: kissa pana tvam āvuso evarūpam akāsi iti

original: Atha kho so nāgo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhū bhagavato etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā taṁ nāgaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe bhikkhu saṅgham sannipāta apetvā tam nāgam etat avoca

analyzed: tumhe khottha nāgāḥ a viruḷhi dhammāḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye

original: Gaccha tvaṁ, nāga, tattheva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposathaṁ upavasa, evaṁ tvaṁ nāgayoniyā ca parimuccissasi, khippañca manussattaṁ paṭilabhissasī”ti.
analyzed: gaccha tva nāga tattha iva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposatham upavase evam tvam nāga yoniyā ca parimuccissasi khippam ca manussa ttam paṭilabhissasi iti

original: Atha kho so nāgo aviruḷhidhammo kirāhaṁ imasmiṁ dhammavinayeti dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno vissaraṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ nāgaḥ a viruḷhi dhammaḥ kira aham imasmin dhamma vinaye ti dukkhī dummanaḥ assūni pavattayamānaḥ vissaram katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “dveme, bhikkhave, paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya.
analyzed: dve me bhikkhave paccayāḥ nāgassa sabhāva pātukammāya

analyzed: yadā ca sajātiyā methunam dhammam paṭisevati yadā ca vissaṭṭhaḥ niddam okkamati

original: ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave dve paccayāḥ nāgassa sabhāva pātukammāya

original: Tiracchānagato, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti.
analyzed: tiracchānagataḥ bhikkhave anupasampannaḥ na upasampādetabbaḥ upasampannaḥ na āsetabbaḥ ti
